metadata.title: CVE-2023-27783 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue found in TCPreplay tcprewrite v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker tocause a denial of service via the tcpedit_dlt_cleanup function atplugins/dlt_plugins.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
